name: Starship
description:
[Game Features]
﹣Super high degree of freedom﹣
In the game, you can get rid of the shackles of the plane, move freely in the three-dimensional space, and cast skills in the full picture without dead ends. Give you a broad stage to give full play to your tactics. At the same time, you have three unique spaceships and thirteen different skills. Get money, parts and skill fragments in victory, create your own spaceship skill combination, and use your exclusive tactics to defeat your opponents!
﹣Strong strategic ﹣
In the game, you need to use your ingenuity, predict the opponent's actions, avoid the opponent's damage, allocate energy reasonably, and deploy skills to push the opponent into death step by step. You will love this game if you like to fight wits and brave people.
With the advancement of space technology and the improvement of weapon lethality, the form of war in the distant future has undergone tremendous changes. It takes a few hours for spacecraft to cross the galaxy. The most powerful weapon can instantly destroy the planet, so the number of The advantage is weakening, and static defense becomes inefficient. How to hit the enemy and not be hit by the enemy has become the most important thing in the interstellar battlefield. This game is designed according to the concept of future space war. Hope You will like it. Welcome to the Star Warship, Commander.
At present, the game has 13 skills and 3 different types of spaceships. Commanders can freely match the most powerful combination in their hearts in the base, fight with other commanders in arenas and ladders, win rich materials, and upgrade spaceships. And skills. Start your space journey.
